main.name: Hamza Mazhar

main.bio:
A results-driven, customer-focused, articulate and analytical Software Engineer who can think “out of the box”. As well
I am equally successful in both team and self-directed settings. My objective is to work in a competitive environment that
effectively utilizes my analytical and technical skills.
main.contactmessage: Will be happy to hear from you.Use my email address

education.description: The two-year Master's program in Data Science builds on the Bachelor's program started in summer semester. It is a joint proj­ect of the Faculties of Statistics, Computer Science, and Mathematics, under the lea­der­ship of the Faculty of Statistics.

education.school: University of Engineering and Technology Lahore (Pakistan)
education.degree: Bachelor of Science In Computer Science
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.
Here I earned the university entrance certificate.

work.title: MERN Stack Developer
work.description:
I have worked as a Full Stack Software Engineer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with our NodeJS backend, as well as built new node-based servers for new products. As well, I led the development of V2 of our web application written in React JS. I have worked extensively with React/Redux as well as with react hooks. 

More recently, I have been given the opportunity to lead our integrations module.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: As an Javascript developer core responsibility  Web development using ReactJs, also experienced in Node/Express Backend development. Provide with the best quality of code with excellent coding styles and proper coding standards

work.title: Internship
work.description: Develop the Games using Unity Game Engine

projects.title: WhatsApp Business Services

testimonials.text: Hamzaamazhar was very approachable and willing to go the extra mile to understand what was being asked. He is focused on delivering satisfaction. I would not hesitate to recommend him. Great job
He is very responsive, ensure that he understands the requirement.
